body_html: Hello @thomasquintana, take a look at the recently introduced tf.data API for windowing and batching of windows (a647188). Among other things, the newly introduced API makes it possible to use different batching logic for different components.
body_text: Hello @thomasquintana, take a look at the recently introduced tf.data API for windowing and batching of windows (a647188). Among other things, the newly introduced API makes it possible to use different batching logic for different components.
body: Hello @thomasquintana, take a look at the recently introduced tf.data API for windowing and batching of windows (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/a6471888cc9dfe9c18d121149bc0516a3f423fbb). Among other things, the newly introduced API makes it possible to use different batching logic for different components.
